Author: biscuitarse

Comment: I'm sure Vance likes to think of himself as Trump's "attack dog" with his never-ending aggression towards America's allies. We saw this when he screamed at Zelenskyy in the Oval Office, when he screamed at European leaders in Munich, when he called the Chinese people "peasants", when he insulted Denmark while standing on their own sovereign territory, the list goes on. Unfortunately for him, he's less of a pitbull and more of an ever-so-slightly flamboyant yapping chihuahua. Nobody takes him seriously, and he's an embarrassment to America.   As for the case in point: Vance and the American administration must know that Ukraine obviously won't be able to accept a "peace deal" that is nothing short of a complete surrender. It's essentially equivalent to Hitler's August 29th, 1945 ["ultimatum" to Poland](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/1939_German_ultimatum_to_Poland). Then, as now, the ultimatum was never meant to be accepted but gave the fascists a convenient fig leaf to pretend that they made a last-ditch effort at peace, when all along it had been decided that Poland's (and now Ukraine's) fate had been sealed. Obviously, the talking heads on Fox will lap it up, but let's not kid ourselves. Trump has no intention of supporting Ukraine and all intentions to carve up Ukraine between himself and Russia in a revival of the [Molotov-Ribbentrop Pact](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Molotov%E2%80%93Ribbentrop_Pact), with Russia keeping the Eastern Ukrainian territories while the US gets full control over the mineral deposits and energy infrastructure of what remains of western Ukraine. If it weren't all so tragic, you'd really have to laugh about the lack of imagination of these people. We've seen this exact same thing play out before.
